citation.case_name: American Future Systems, Inc. v. BETTER BUSINESS BUREAU OF EASTERN PENNSYLVANIA

html_lawbox:
128 S.Ct. 806 (2007)

AMERICAN FUTURE SYSTEMS, INC., dba Progressive Business Publications, petitioner,
v.
BETTER BUSINESS BUREAU OF EASTERN PENNSYLVANIA and Better Business Bureau of Metropolitan Washington.

No. 07-285.

Supreme Court of United States.

December 10, 2007.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the Supreme Court of Pennsylvania, Eastern District, denied.
